amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Office of the Under Secretary for Research, Education and Economics by $400,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the appropriation for the Office of the Under Secretary for Research, Education and Economics by $400,000, from $940,000 to $540,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coburn amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 278 (Roll no. 157).
